attributes.action: Give ALL NHS STAFF a TAX FREE bonus of £10,000 pounds immediately.
attributes.background:
Wake up Government! Do NOT INSULT the NHS with a paltry 1% pay rise. We LOVE and ADMIRE ALL those who work for the NHS. 
Give them ALL a £10,000 Tax free bonus forthwith.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Pay 15% bonus to public facing NHS staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570762

Give all Nurses and lower paid NHS Staff a tax free bonus of £5000
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568198

Pay a £2,500 bonus to all NHS employees.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578041

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970
